casebody.data:
Lyman against Sale and others. A LIKE decree was made in this case, in which the mortgage was to secure the payment of four several bonds, some of which were not yet due; but as the payment of the *second bond would become due before the period of six weelcs, for advertising under the decree, would elapse, the payment of that bond was included in the order of sale.

June 17th.

[ * 488 ]
